attachments.pretext: Following Individual has been marked as noncompliant against rule defined by the organization's compliance team

fields.title: Remediation
fields.value: Associate tag that is absent to the resource properly

fields.title: rule description
fields.value: Such a resource type is supposed to be associated with predefined tags. Visit <https://awsRegion.console.aws.amazon.com/config/home?region=awsRegion&awsc-custsat-override=promptUser#/rules/rule-details/required-tags|required-tags> or else ask your compliance team for details
